|wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050;BCM2050KML, TC0401 P11, 710723; |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=MC |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=ADMtek |sw_model=ADM6996L;ADM6996L, AA0410, HSS402014.1SL; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT,Tomato,OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=000D0BXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^000D0B[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.11.1 |default_user=root |default_pass= |oui=00:0D:0B |oui_eth=00:0D:0B }} {{TechInfoDepot|Buffalo_WBR2-G54}}
[http://dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/Flash_Your_Buffalo_WBR-G54%2C_WLA-G54%2C_... On the DD-WRT wiki] "MILKY WAY", "P/N:01-000585-04", and "REV:3.3" is silkscreened on the board. The default SSID is the LAN MAC address (upper case letters). The included power adapter is a '''Buffalo''' KTL SU10160-3004 , AT7094A (3.3V, 2A). ID/OD/Len measurements are approximate. ==Images== ===External=== File:Buffalo WBR2-G54 angled.jpg|angled File:Buffalo WBR2-G54 front.jpg|front panel File:Buffalo WBR2-G54 side.jpg|side panel File:Buffalo WBR2-G54 back.jpg|back [[Has images::external| ]][[Has images::label| ]] ===Internal=== File:Buffalo WBR2-G54 board top.jpg|board top File:Buffalo WBR2-G54 RF.jpg|RF section File:Buffalo WBR2-G54 CPU.jpg|the BCM4712 CPU [[Has images::internal| ]]
